name: Contra Costa County Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Contra Costa County residents
fullDescription: The Contra Costa County Housing Authority administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents throughout Contra Costa County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Public housing units
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Special programs for families and seniors
howToGetIt:
1. Check CCCHA website for waitlist status
2. Apply when waitlist opens
3. Must meet income limits
4. County residents get preference
5. Wait for name on waitlist
keywords: CCCHA, Contra Costa Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, Richmond, Concord, low-income, waitlist
